Original: 渡船人-景觀-咖啡廳-酒吧位在八里渡船頭老街內，必須先找到熱炒冰品店之後，進入店內上樓到三樓即達，在熱炒冰品店門前有個小招牌跟菜單。上樓的樓梯途中每格階梯都有金句，讓人上樓期間不會無聊，到達三樓入眼是吧檯，簡約的設計乾淨明瞭，座位有分室內跟室外，沒下雨的好天氣當然要坐戶外陽台區，真的是淡水河畔第一排景觀，可以看渡船來來往往，吹著河面上來的風，觀著淡水的景，真的是很愜意的咖啡景觀喔！到了晚上可以看燈景，又是另一種風情，還有各式調酒可以選擇，非常適合三五好友來這裡聊天散心！
EN: Ferryman-Landscape-Cafe-Bar is located in the old street of Bali Watanabe. After you must first find a hot ice-fried ice shop, enter the store and go upstairs to the third floor. Follow the menu.Every staircase on the stairs on the stairs has golden sentences, so that people will not be boring while going upstairs. When you reach the third floor, you can enter the bar. The simple design is clean. The outdoor balcony area is really the first row of landscapes on the Danshui River. You can see the ferry and go, blowing the wind from the river, and watching the light of fresh water. It is really a very comfortable coffee landscape!At night, you can watch the lantern, and it is another style. There are also various types of bartending to choose from. It is very suitable for three or five friends to come here to chat and disperse!

Original:

餐廳氛圍不錯，就年輕人開的店，現場可以服務的桌數算多，昨天是周間星期四，但到達時及離開前都陸續有客人，服務生親切，也換上女僕裝，感覺有想用心經營，弭補餐廳地點不接市的劣勢。

下次來八里會再造訪!

Operating with your heart, the disadvantage of the restaurant's location is not connected to the market.
A total of 3 different pasta, 2 cups of alcoholic drinks and cheese refining milk fries were ordered with friends. As far as the meals in the scenic area are concerned, it is very delicious and the price is fair.
Next time you come to Bali to visit!

今天帶狗狗打疫苗，晚上想說去兜風吃個宵夜順便犒賞牠，意外的找到這間景觀餐廳，Menu裡也有罕見的寵物餐點😋

到店前先打電話詢問是否能帶狗狗，老闆娘也在電話裡提到店內有三隻溫馴的大狗🤩
立馬從桃園出發前往，到門口後老闆娘及店狗們非常熱情歡迎🤩，雖然店狗真的每隻都很結實🤣，但是比想像中還熱情更不失溫柔，家裡的毛孩跟店狗玩得不亦樂乎還捨不得離開🥹，餐點及飲品和寵物餐CP值很高，第一次看到家裡的毛孩把寵物餐濃湯喝得一乾二淨，就知道有多好吃🥳，餐廳乾淨而且沒有異味，非常推薦👍

雖然是寵物友善環境，也希望每個飼主能確保自己家的毛小孩能與其他個體和平相處，一起永續這友好環境🙏
EN:
Today I took a dog to get the vaccine. I wanted to go on a ride to eat for a supper at night. I accidentally found this landscape restaurant. There is also a rare pet meal in Menu 😋

Before you arrive in the store, please call to ask if you can bring a dog. The boss also mentioned on the phone that there are three tamed big dogs in the store.
I immediately set off from Taoyuan, and the bosses and dogs were very enthusiastic to welcome. Although the shop dogs were really strong, they were more enthusiastic than I thought. I can't bear to leave the 🥹. The CP value of meals and drinks and pet meals is very high. For the first time, I saw the hair of the family at home and drank the pet meal soup. And there is no odor, it is recommended ，

Although it is a pet -friendly environment, I also hope that each owner can ensure that the hairy children in their homes can get along peacefully with other individuals and sustain this friendly environment together.

Original:
平日八里出差行的晚間放鬆
少客人，11月戶外涼風舒適，室內播放的音樂很讚，喜歡聽台灣獨立樂團的朋友會蠻喜歡
3樓的狗狗初見時很熱情，但沉澱後不太會打擾客人。店員不會多話打擾客人，但對酒款感興趣的客人值得多交流討論。

新加坡司令，在要求減甜度後表現平衡，酸甜滋味配海風令人放鬆

店家特調 - 生命之泉，蘋果白蘭地與海軍強度琴酒搭配，但仍保留親民充足甜感，酒感隱藏的很柔和，配上香薰、香味迷人的炙燒雞胸肉，是杯視覺、味覺，嗅覺都各有迷人的調酒

最後以知多純飲收尾，採用威士忌而非聞香杯，純淨木質調與甜感的結合很舒服

是家可以親民，也兼具專業的酒吧
酒款單杯150-400，相當合理
來八里一帶值得推薦
EN:
Relax in the evening when you travel on a business trip on weekdays
Young guests, the outdoor cool wind is comfortable in November, the music played indoor is very good. Friends who like to listen to the Taiwan independent orchestra will like it.
Dogs on the 3rd floor were very enthusiastic when they first met, but they did not disturb the guests after precipitation.The clerk will not talk more about the guests, but the guests interested in the wine deserve more exchanges and discussions.

Singapore Commander, the performance is balanced after requiring the sweetness, and the sweet and sour taste is relaxed.

The store special-the spring of life, the apple Bailan land is matched with the strength of the navy's strength, but still retains the sweet feeling of the people, the wine is hidden, and the fragrant and fragrant roasted chicken breasts are the cup vision and taste. The sense of smell has its own charming bartending

In the end, I tied with a multi -pure drink, using whiskey instead of smelling the incense cup. The combination of pure wood tone and sweetness is very comfortable.

It is a family that can be close to the people, but also a professional bar
The wine single cup is 150-400, which is quite reasonable
It is worth recommending in Bali
